ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Cloud}
“I remember…the intense heat of the flames…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Tifa}
“This was all burnt down, wasn't it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Tifa}
“Then why…
My house is still here too…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Aeris}
“This is Nibelheim, right?
But the town's all here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Barret}
“The hell's goin' on!?
This a dream or somethin'?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Barret}
“You said the whole town burnt down, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Barret}
“You tryin' to fool us?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Red XIII}
“I wonder what's going on…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Red XIII}
“This is Nibelheim?
I heard it burnt down.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Red XIII}
“{Cloud}…
Did you lie to us?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // {Yuffie}
“I thought someone said
this town burnt down!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, maybe you
were just dreaming…?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Cait Sith}
“The whole town was destroyed by Sephiroth.
At least that's what I heard…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, did you make up that story
just to get our support?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, maybe you
were just dreaming…?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Cait Sith}
“The whole town was destroyed by Sephiroth.
At least that's what I heard…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, did you make up that story
just to get our support?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // {Cid}
“Hey, it isn't like
what you told me!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Cid}
“Didn't you say that your hometown
burned down?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Cid}
“Yo, {Cloud}.
It's not good to lie.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // “The…Great…Se…phi…roth…
is…near…"{PAUSE}“In…side…inside…the Mansion…
Urrrrrrrgh…the great…Sephi…roth”

dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“This was all burnt down, wasn't it?”

{Tifa}
“Then why…
My house is still here too…”

{Barret}
“The hell's goin' on!?
This a dream or somethin'?”

{Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, maybe you
were just dreaming…?”

{Cid}
“Hey, it isn't like
what you told me!”

{Barret}
“You said the whole town burnt down, right?”

{Aeris}
“This is Nibelheim, right?
But the town's all here.”

{Red XIII}
“This is Nibelheim?
I heard it burnt down.”

{Cait Sith}
“The whole town was destroyed by Sephiroth.
At least that's what I heard…”

{Cid}
“Didn't you say that your hometown
burned down?”

{Yuffie}
“I thought someone said
this town burnt down!”

{Red XIII}
“{Cloud}…
Did you lie to us?”

{Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, did you make up that story
just to get our support?”

{Cloud}
“I remember…the intense heat of the flames…”
